Description: Online Scrum, Kanban and Scrumban project management software.
Name: ScrumDo

Methods.Name: Get Epics
Methods.Description: Get all epics for a project.

Methods.Name: Get Organizations
Methods.Description: Get organisations visible to this account.

Methods.Name: Get Iterations for Project
Methods.Description: Get all iterations for a project.

Methods.Name: Get Latest Iteration for Project
Methods.Description: Get latest iteration for a project.

Methods.Name: Get Projects
Methods.Description: Get all projects for an organisation.

Methods.Name: Create New Story
Methods.Description: Create a new story within an iteration.

Methods.Name: Get Stories for Project
Methods.Description: Get all stories for a project.

Methods.Name: Update Story Custom Fields
Methods.Description: Update custom fields within a story. This only works for text type custom fields. Use the "List Template Custom Fields" method to obtain all custom field ID's. Add these as needed to this method with the "Field Location" set to the custom field ID to map.

Methods.Name: Get Story By ID
Methods.Description: Get story within a project by ID.

Methods.Name: Get Stories By Iteration
Methods.Description: Get all stories for an iteration.

Methods.Name: List Project Templates
Methods.Description: List all templates for a project.

Methods.Name: List Template Custom Fields
Methods.Description: List all custom fields for a template.
